sections.heading: 227.10 through 227.30 of this title shall be known and may be cited as the “Oklahoma Abstractors Act”
sections.text: Added by Laws 1984, c. 163, § 1, eff. Nov. 1, 1984. Amended by Laws 2006, c. 269, § 2, eff. July 1, 2007; Laws 2007, c. 359, § 1, eff. Jan. 1, 2008. Renumbered from Title 74, § 227.10 by Laws 2007,
